org.eclipse.emf.compare.match.statistic
Class DifferencesServices

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.emf.compare.match.statistic.DifferencesServices
All Implemented Interfaces:
MatchEngine
public class DifferencesServices
extends java.lang.Object
implements MatchEngine

These services are usefull when one want to compare models more precisely using the method modelDiff. Known bugs and limitation: 1- modeldiff only works if the two roots given are similar

modelMatch

public MatchModel modelMatch(EObject root1,
                             EObject root2,
                             IProgressMonitor monitor)
                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException
Return a mapping model between the two other models.. Basically the difference is calculated this way : - both models are browsed and compared, Mappings are created when two nodes are considered as similar - Nodes wich has not been mapped are compared in order to map them - The mapping tree is browsed in order to determine the modification log - the modification log (an EMF model) is returned Known bugs and limitation: 1Â°- modeldiff only works if the two roots given are similar

Specified by:
modelMatch in interface MatchEngine
Parameters:
root1 - the first root element
root2 - the second root element
Returns:
a mapping model between the two other models..
Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException
FactoryException
ENodeCastException
